entries.meaning: A person who telephones, especially one who does so for a commercial organization.
examples:
Consequent on the war and the blackout regulations,as an emergency measure to assist the staff in gettinghome before it is fully dark, our office hours (without alunch interval), commencing Monday, November 20,and continuing until Saturday, February 10, 1940, will be :
Mondays to Fridays - 9 a.m. till 3.15 p.m.
Saturdays   -   - 9 a.m. till 1 p.m.
